watchlists.name: US Large Cap Core
watchlists.description: Flagship set of highly liquid US equities maintained by Norgate, aligns with the S&P 500 constituents.
watchlists.notes: Updated monthly; includes historic constituent changes when used with Norgate Data.

watchlists.name: US Technology Leaders
watchlists.description: Top Nasdaq-listed technology shares, comparable to the Nasdaq-100 (NDX).
watchlists.notes: Includes ADRs; excludes financials consistent with NDX methodology.

watchlists.name: US Mid Cap Growth
watchlists.description: Selection of 400 mid-cap growth stocks sourced from Norgate's Russell-style universe.
watchlists.notes: Pairs well with breadth scans and rotational strategies.

watchlists.name: Global ADR Core
watchlists.description: Diversified collection of American Depositary Receipts spanning major regions.
watchlists.notes: Includes liquidity filter; covers Europe, APAC, and LATAM.

watchlists.name: ASX 200
watchlists.description: Australian securities corresponding to the S&P/ASX 200 index.
